generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Traits
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Change the placement position and direction behavior of a block

fields.title: Minecraft Placement Direction
fields.description: Adds the "minecraft:cardinal_direction" and/or "minecraft:facing_direction" states and setter function to the block.

fields.title: Minecraft Placement Position
fields.description: Adds the "minecraft:block_face" and/or "minecraft:vertical_half" states and setter function to the block.
